name: Garuda Linux
description: Garuda Linux is a visually stunning, performance-oriented Arch-based distribution. It features out-of-the-box enhancements, gaming optimizations, and a focus on user experience.

sections.title: Early Years
sections.text: Garuda was founded in 2020 to offer a more accessible, modern Arch experience, with performance and visual appeal at the forefront.

sections.title: Growth and Development
sections.text: It rapidly gained a following for its Btrfs filesystem with auto-snapshots, integrated gaming tools, and eye-catching desktop environments like KDE Dr460nized.

sections.title: Current Status

sections.title: Performance and Visuals
sections.text: Garuda is tailored for gaming and performance with Zen kernel, auto-tuning, and bold visual themes, making it stand out among Arch-based distros.
